stdyInfo.abstract: This is the replication data associated with our article in our "Journal of Vegetation Science" titled "Standing vegetation as a coarse biotic filter for seedbank dynamics: effects of gap creation on seed inputs and outputs in a native grassland". Please see the ReadMe file for details on dataset contents. (2019-06-07)
